mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT b.*, u.user_no as "user.userNo", u.user_id as "user.userId" FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_no = u.user_no WHERE board_no = #{no}

SELECT * FROM board
title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
board_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(l.board_no), 0) as like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN likes l ON b.board_no = l.board_no GROUP BY b.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no DESC;
SELECT COUNT(l.board_no) FROM board b LEFT JOIN likes l ON b.board_no = l.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{no} GROUP BY b.board_no;
SELECT * FROM board b RIGHT JOIN board_report r ON b.board_no = r.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no DESC;

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(l.board_no), 0) as like_count FROM board b RIGHT JOIN board_report r ON b.board_no = r.board_no LEFT JOIN likes l ON b.board_no = l.board_no GROUP BY b.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no DESC;
SELECT report_status FROM board_report r LEFT JOIN board b ON b.board_no = r.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no DESC;

SELECT b.*, u.user_id as "user.userId", u.user_no as "user.userNo", r.report_status as "boardReport.reportStatus", r.report_reason as "boardReport.reportReason", r.report_date as "boardReport.reportDate" FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_no = u.user_no LEFT JOIN board_report r ON b.board_no = r.board_no WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, category, user_no) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{userNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content= #{content}, category= #{category} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
